name: GlaiveZ
description:
GlaiveZ is an intense, fast-action, and challenging VR title.

A twist on traditional wave-based action. Featuring unique transitions to new areas, boss battles, challenges, and of course, battle-GlaiveZ! So bring the skillz, scoot over on the shooter, and test yourself with the power of the GlaiveZ!

Master your potential!

  • Wield two deadly kinetic GlaiveZ and battle the Dark Enemy!
  • Throw the GlaiveZ, make your kill, call them back, and attack again!
  • Ascend the Tower of Peril, transverse the enemy and their deadly machines, then confront the Ultimate Darkness!
  • Mind your speed, accuracy, and time your throws or meet your demise!
